actions.name: Autocomplete
actions.description: Grants permission to autocomplete text input with potential places and addresses as the user types

actions.name: Geocode
actions.description: Grants permission to geocode a textual address or place into geographic coordinates

actions.name: GetPlace
actions.description: Grants permission to query a place by it's unqiue place ID

actions.name: ReverseGeocode
actions.description: Grants permission to convert geographic coordinates into a human-readable address or place

actions.name: SearchNearby
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve places near a position which match to a set of user defined restrictions such as category or food type offered by the place

actions.name: SearchText
actions.description: Grants permission to query for places using a single free-form text input

actions.name: Suggest
actions.description: Grants permission to suggest potential places based on the user's input
